Title: 37727 - # Best Android Tablets of 2016
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 Android tablets of 2016 and discuss what they are and what they do. Talk about specs for each tablet, what makes it unique, price, etc. You can include the client link by mentioning looking up reviews on tablets that you are interested in buying

Title: 37728 - # of the Best Apps for Being Productive
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 of the best apps for productivity. There are many apps available for both Android and iPhone that can help you be more productive at work, home, or on-the-go. Discuss some of the best apps to help you get things done and keep things in order. You can mention the client link by saying that new apps are constantly being introduced and this way the reader can stay up on the latest news.  Add the client link when discussing an Android app.Your target audience is for tech savvy people that like to get the most out of their phone.

Title: 37729 - The Top # Ways to Use Your Android Device to Kill Time
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 ways to kill time with your Android device. Talk about various ways you can use up free time with an Android smartphone or tablet. The ways can include games, productive apps to get work done, or something where you can learn on your spare time. The biggest advantage of many of these apps is that they can be easily accessible and they can take up a few moments or hours of your time and keep you occupied. You can place the client link by mentioning that apps are always changing and you can stay current on changes in the Android app world with Android Headlines. Your target audience is people that are tech savvy and stay up on the latest technology.
